summary: Diff adds a Motoko product-catalog actor plus frontend landing/product components, React Query hooks, and a premium warm/bronze theme. Core landing navigation and backend-driven product rendering appear implemented, but required generated image asset files are not present in the diff, and several changes touch paths listed as immutable in the BuildRequest constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (hero + logo + 3 product images).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the expected /assets/generated/*.png paths, but the diff summary shows no added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the required images are not actually added as static assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not edit files under frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes changes at multiple paths listed as immutable (they appear as added files in the diff summary). This violates the constraint if these files already existed or were intended to be untouched.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend method to fetch a single product by id (getProductById) and corresponding frontend query hook useGetProductById.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires at least one query returning the product list; single-product lookup was not requested.
